subject: p11880923
History: Splenectomy, respiratory distress, evaluation for pleural effusion.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. Pleural effusions bilaterally, right more than left, the distribution of which has changed, but not their overall extent. In the interval, the patient has been extubated. The other monitoring and support devices remain in place. Unchanged size of the cardiac silhouette. Unchanged mild fluid overload.
